ps3.1:19.28: Puthujjanasadharane dhamme atikkamma paramatthe nibbane nanam pavattatiti—puthupanna.

ps3.1:23.1: Puthujjanakalyanakassa panna atthamakassa pannaya dure vidure suvidure na santike na samanta.
ps3.1:23.3: Atthamakassa panna sotapannassa pannaya dure vidure suvidure na santike na samanta.
ps3.1:23.5: Sotapannassa panna sakadagamissa pannaya dure vidure suvidure na santike na samanta.
ps3.1:23.7: Sakadagamissa panna anagamissa pannaya dure vidure suvidure na santike na samanta.
ps3.1:23.9: Anagamissa panna arahato pannaya dure vidure suvidure na santike na samanta.
ps3.1:23.11: Arahato panna paccekasambuddhassa pannaya dure vidure suvidure na santike na samanta.
ps3.1:23.13: Paccekabuddhanca sadevakanca lokam upadaya tathagato araham sammasambuddho aggo asamantapanno.
ps3.1:24.1: Pannapabhedakusalo pabhinnanano adhigatappatisambhido catuvesarajjappatto dasabaladhari purisasabho purisasiho purisanago purisajanno purisadhorayho anantanano anantatejo anantayaso addho mahaddhano dhanava neta vineta anuneta pannapeta nijjhapeta pekkheta pasadeta.
ps3.1:24.2: “So hi bhagava anuppannassa maggassa uppadeta, asanjatassa maggassa sanjaneta, anakkhatassa maggassa akkhata, maggannu maggavidu maggakovido magganugami ca panassa etarahi savaka viharanti paccha samannagata”.
ps3.1:25.1: “So hi bhagava janam janati, passam passati, cakkhubhuto nanabhuto dhammabhuto brahmabhuto vatta pavatta atthassa ninneta amatassa data dhammassami tathagato.
ps3.1:25.2: Natthi tassa bhagavato annatam adittham aviditam asacchikatam aphassitam pannaya.
ps3.1:25.3: Atitam anagatam paccuppannam upadaya sabbe dhamma sabbakarena buddhassa bhagavato nanamukhe apatham agacchanti.
ps3.1:25.4: Yam kinci neyyam nama atthi tam sabbam janitabbam.
ps3.1:25.5: Attattho va parattho va ubhayattho va ditthadhammiko va attho samparayiko va attho uttano va attho gambhiro va attho gulho va attho paticchanno va attho neyyo va attho nito va attho anavajjo va attho nikkileso va attho vodano va attho paramattho va attho, sabbam tam antobuddhanane parivattati.
ps3.1:26.7: Yavatakam neyyam tavatakam nanam, yavatakam nanam tavatakam neyyam.
ps3.1:26.12: Yatha dvinnam samuggapatalanam samma phusitanam hetthimam samuggapatalam uparimam nativattati, uparimam samuggapatalam hetthimam nativattati, annamannapariyantatthayino;
ps3.1:26.13: evameva buddhassa bhagavato neyyanca nananca annamannapariyantatthayino.
ps3.1:26.14: Yavatakam neyyam tavatakam nanam, yavatakam nanam tavatakam neyyam.
ps3.1:27.1: Sabbe dhamma buddhassa bhagavato avajjanappatibaddha akankhappatibaddha manasikarappatibaddha cittuppadappatibaddha.
ps3.1:27.3: Sabbesam sattanam buddho asayam janati, anusayam janati, caritam janati, adhimuttim janati.
ps3.1:27.4: Apparajakkhe maharajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svakare dvakare suvinnapaye duvinnapaye bhabbabhabbe satte pajanati.
ps3.1:27.5: Sadevako loko samarako sabrahmako sassamanabrahmani paja sadevamanussa antobuddhanane parivattati.
ps3.1:28.1: Yatha ye keci macchakacchapa, antamaso timitimingalam upadaya, antomahasamudde parivattanti, evamevam sadevako loko samarako sabrahmako sassamanabrahmani paja sadevamanussa antobuddhanane parivattati.
ps3.1:28.2: Yatha ye keci pakkhino, antamaso garulam venateyyam upadaya, akasassa padese parivattanti;
ps3.1:28.3: evameva yepi te sariputtasama pannaya tepi buddhananassa padese parivattanti.
ps3.1:28.4: Buddhananam devamanussanam pannam pharitva atighamsitva titthati.
ps3.1:29.1: Yepi te khattiyapandita brahmanapandita gahapatipandita samanapandita nipuna kataparappavada valavedhirupa vobhindanta manne caranti pannagatena ditthigatani, te panham abhisankharitva abhisankharitva tathagatam upasankamitva pucchanti gulhani ca paticchannani ca.
ps3.1:29.2: Kathita visajjita ca te panha bhagavata honti nidditthakarana.
ps3.1:29.4: Atha kho bhagava tattha atirocati yadidam pannaya”ti.
ps3.1:30.47: sabbe bhavagamikamma ari tam arim maddanipannati—bhuripanna.
ps3.1:30.49: Taya pathavisamaya vitthataya vipulaya pannaya samannagatoti—bhuripanna.

ps3.1:35.2: Yam kinci rupam atitanagatapaccuppannam ajjhattam va bahiddha va olarikam va sukhumam va hinam va panitam va yam dure santike va, sabbam rupam aniccato khippam javatiti—javanapanna.

ps3.1:38.28: Ekasmim asane cattaro ca ariyamagga cattari ca samannaphalani catasso patisambhidayo cha abhinnayo adhigata honti sacchikata phassita pannayati—tikkhapanna.
ps3.1:39.2: Idhekacco sabbasankharesu ubbegabahulo hoti uttasabahulo ukkanthanabahulo aratibahulo anabhiratibahulo.
ps3.1:40.2: Imahi solasahi pannahi samannagato puggalo patisambhidappatto.

ps3.1:48.3: Yo savakaparamippatto, so tena atireko hoti, adhiko hoti, viseso hoti.
ps3.1:49.1: Dve puggala patisambhidappatta, dvepi pubbayogasampanna, dvepi bahussuta, dvepi desanabahula, dvepi garupanissita, dvepi viharabahula, dvepi paccavekkhanabahula, dvepi asekhapatisambhidappatta—
ps3.1:49.3: Yo paccekasambuddho, so tena atireko hoti, adhiko hoti, viseso hoti.
ps3.1:50.1: Paccekabuddhanca sadevakanca lokam upadaya tathagato araham sammasambuddho aggo patisambhidappatto pannapabhedakusalo pabhinnanano adhigatapatisambhido catuvesarajjappatto dasabaladhari purisasabho purisasiho …pe…
ps3.1:50.2: yepi te khattiyapandita brahmanapandita gahapatipandita samanapandita nipuna kataparappavada valavedhirupa vobhindanta manne caranti pannagatena ditthigatani, te panham abhisankharitva abhisankharitva tathagatam upasankamitva pucchanti gulhani ca paticchannani ca.
ps3.1:50.3: Kathita visajjita ca te panha bhagavata honti nidditthakarana, upakkhittaka ca te bhagavato sampajjanti.
ps3.1:50.4: Atha kho bhagava tattha atirocati, yadidam pannayati aggo patisambhidappattoti.
